name: Dimensions (itch) (NightFury3000, Nossima, ChridAMid)
description:
The Assets used in the game were from following creators and the assets were used under commercial purpose use and we don't take credit in the assets used.

Environment (tiles & decor) : Blackspire on the Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixelart-tileset-1-163814) Obstacles (box): Cpt_Flash on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/2d-wooden-box) Character : Puddi on th Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-character-bolchie-114179) Items (balls) : Amon on OpenGameArt (https://opengameart.org/content/magic-orbs) GUI : Gamertose on the Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/white-black-gui-168805) Sounds : interaction sounds from https://themushroomkingdom.net/media/smb/wav and background music by Chrid

DEVELOPERS-

Chrid - Music Production, Level Design
Amidama - Lever Design, Programming
NightFury - Programming,Gameplay
